mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nextjob_db.projects (name, content, user_id, start_at, end_at, project_type, create_date, image, type) VALUES (#{name}, #{content}, #{creatorId}, #{startAt}, #{endAt}, #{projectType}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{image}, #{type});
mapper.select: SELECT project_id, name, content, start_at, end_at, GetDetailCodeName('PROJECT_TYPE', project_type) AS project_type, image, type FROM projects WHERE project_id = #{projectId}
SELECT user_id FROM projects WHERE project_id = #{projectId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO requests ( project_id, user_id, request_type, request_status ) VALUES ( #{projectId}, #{userId}, #{requestType}, #{requestStatus} )
INSERT INTO project_members (project_id, user_id, job_title) VALUES (#{projectId}, #{userId}, #{jobTitle});
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM project_members WHERE project_id = #{projectId} and user_id = #{userId}
